page.title: 15Life on a farm in Stithians
page.content: I am a nine year old girl. My parents get up at 5 a.m. every day to milk the cows. Two hours later I get up. We don't have much chance to play. Sometimes farming is hard especially in the Winter. It takes us about two hours to milk 90 cows. We have another 22 cows which have been dried off so they don't produce milk to prepare them for their calves which are due in August and September. In the summer you have not got much time to go to the beach because you have to carry the hay, straw and corn and you have to put the kale in the ground. I help feed the calves in the morning one of the boys in my class helps in the evening. I like it in the Summer best when the weather is good. I enjoy hay making.
